ResultMessage.FormattedCode: Failed to parse Cloud Portal service request XML. {0}

Configuration.Description: Input values that are necessary for the process to run are passed to it through an XML fragment which is parsed by this activity to obtain the individual parameters.

ActivityNode.DisplayName: Convert Virtual Server To Template >> Pre-Processing

NewValue.HardcodedValue: Failed to find vCenter Service Target.

ActivityNode.Notes: Fail the entire process

ResultMessage.HardcodedValue: A vCenter server target could not be found.

Configuration.Description: The Center target is the platform on which this process runs. This is passed to it through one of the input parameters. This activity validates that target and if that target if found to bre invalid, causes the process to abort.
The validated vCenter target is being stored in one of the target properties which are simply variables available within the process.
